font.p:
Implemented fast variants of RSA, as a part of our cryptography course project in my fourth year at NITK. Implemented the following variants of RSA algorithm: Batch RSA, Mprime RSA, Mpower RSA, Rebalanced RSA, Rprime RSA. These were coded in Java.The research paper we referred to was this, titled "Fast Variants of RSA", Dan Boneh et al.
The code for this project can be found here.
